Posts.Content: I have an appointment in a few days with my doctor ~ so I am being proactive.  I was wondering though... should I be freaked out?  I was diagnosed with Hodgkins Lymphoma in 2003 and went through chemo and radiation.  The doctors told me that the radiation that I was exposed to on my chest increased my chances of breast cancer.  NOW... 8 years later I am having these issues.  I am scared to death!!!
Posts.Title: Breast is swollen and very tender
